TITLE: Why election polls were so wrong in 2016 and 2020 — and what's changing to fix that
SUMMARY: 2016 election polls estimated Hillary Clinton had a 90% chance of beating Donald Trump.

TITLE: Guo Wengui chief of staff Yvette Wang pleads guilty to $1 billion fraud conspiracy in New York
SUMMARY: Guo Wengui, an associate of Trump White House advisor Steve Bannon, is due to stand trial in the fraud case in New York federal court in several weeks.

TITLE: SEC charges Trump Media auditor with 'massive fraud' on hundreds of companies, imposes lifetime ban
SUMMARY: Trump Media, the owner of the Truth Social app, trades under the DJT ticker. Former President Donald Trump is the majority shareholder of the company.

TITLE: Trump trial: Former top aide Hope Hicks cries as cross-examination begins
SUMMARY: Judge Juan Merchan has yet to rule on whether Donald Trump once again violated the gag order barring him from speaking about jurors and witnesses.

TITLE: Britain's ruling Conservatives hit with another local defeat as general election nears
SUMMARY: The votes are likely to be the last major political test for U.K. leader Rishi Sunak's Conservative Party ahead of a general election later this year.

TITLE: A Trump SEC would aim to reverse climate disclosure rule, ratchet up ESG fights, sources say
SUMMARY: The Securities and Exchange Commission would shift priorities under a Trump administration, likely eschewing climate disclosure rules and reviving fi

TITLE: Trump campaign lawyers can't quit workplace discrimination case for now, judge rules
SUMMARY: The lawsuit by A.J. Delgado claims the Trump campaign discriminated against her after she revealed she was pregnant by Jason Miller, another advisor.

TITLE: U.S. intelligence chief warns Congress of rise in cyberattacks
SUMMARY: The new comments from Haines come as companies such as UnitedHealth Group, MGM Resorts and Clorox have been disrupted by cyberattacks in the past year.

TITLE: Trump Media pushes House to probe 8 firms over short-selling of DJT shares
SUMMARY: Donald Trump is the majority shareholder in Trump Media and the best-known user of its Truth Social app. When DJT shares fall, his net worth can take a bit hit.

TITLE: Trump denies sleeping during trial: 'I simply close my beautiful blue eyes'
SUMMARY: Donald Trump returned to his criminal hush money trial in New York after Judge Juan Merchan held him in contempt for violating his gag order.

TITLE: Trump's potential VP picks and major Republican donors are coming to Mar-a-Lago
SUMMARY: Donald Trump is set to fly from New York to Florida this weekend to mingle with Republican donors and potential running mates.

TITLE: Trump campaign lawyers' bid to withdraw from discrimination case gets closed-door hearing
SUMMARY: Arlene "A.J." Delgado is suing the presidential campaign of Donald Trump for allegedly discriminating against her after she disclosed her pregnancy in 2016.

TITLE: 'Basel III' bank rules could pose unexpected threat to Biden's green energy plans
SUMMARY: Renewable energy groups and congressional Democrats are raising alarms about potential harm to clean energy goals from a proposed banking regulation.

TITLE: DOJ charges 'Bitcoin Jesus' with $48 million tax fraud, seeks extradition
SUMMARY: The IRS has tried to become more sophisticated in tracking alleged Bitcoin financial crimes.

TITLE: DJT shares close down more than 9% as Trump Media hot streak stalls
SUMMARY: Trump Media, owner of the Truth Social app, has seen a series of gains for its DJT ticker, even after majority shareholder Donald Trump earned extra shares.

TITLE: Police use tear gas, water cannons and stun grenades on 'foreign agent' bill protesters in Georgia's capital
SUMMARY: Tear gas, stun grenades and water cannons were used by riot police against protesters of Georgia's controversial "foreign agent" bill in its capital Tbilisi.

TITLE: Trump Media insider trading trial begins with co-founder testifying, 'I've never been paid at all'
SUMMARY: Trump Media announced plans to merge with a shell company in late 2021. The legal fallout from the deal is playing out in multiple courtrooms.

TITLE: DJT: Trump receives 36 million shares of Trump Media worth $1.8 billion as earnout bonus
SUMMARY: The shares were part of a contractual "earnout bonus" that Trump's eponymous media company agreed to shortly before it went public in March.

TITLE: Trump could drive inflation higher with his second-term economic agenda, analysts say
SUMMARY: Donald Trump has blamed President Joe Biden for stubbornly high inflation during Biden's presidency.

TITLE: Trump Media shares rise again, jump 50% in the past week
SUMMARY: The stock has had several volatile days in the past month, trading at a high of about $60 a share and a low of just over $20 per share.

TITLE: Biden replaces Obama-era infrastructure protections to defend against Chinese cyberthreats
SUMMARY: FBI Director Christopher Wray has repeatedly warned the public and members of Congress of the imminent threat posed by Chinese hackers.

TITLE: Trump gets jail warning for violating hush money trial gag order; Stormy Daniels ex-lawyer testifies
SUMMARY: The criminal hush money trial of former President Donald Trump resumed in Manhattan Supreme Court for the second week of witness testimony.

TITLE: DJT: Why Trump Media shares closed more than 12% higher
SUMMARY: Trump Media, trading under the DJT ticker, has more than doubled in share price during the criminal trial of majority shareholder Donald Trump.

TITLE: Supreme Court won't let former Trump aide Peter Navarro out of jail while he appeals sentence
SUMMARY: The Supreme Court denied a request by ex-Donald Trump advisor Peter Navarro to get out of jail while he appeals his four-month sentence for defying a subpoena.

TITLE: Scottish First Minister Humza Yousaf resigns after ending power-sharing agreement
SUMMARY: Scottish First Minister Humza Yousaf resigned Monday after the collapse of his power-sharing agreement with the country's Green Party.

TITLE: Only the U.S. has the ability to break the cycle of violence in Gaza, Egyptian foreign minister says
SUMMARY: Egypt's Foreign Minister Sameh Shoukry called on the U.S. to leverage its influence over Israel to prevent further bloodshed in Gaza.

TITLE: Germany's far-right AfD party is finding success on TikTok — as its popularity among young voters grows
SUMMARY: The youth vote for Germany's far-right party, the AfD is growing ahead of key elections, and social media may be playing a significant role in this development.

TITLE: Trump VP contender Kristi Noem stands by killing her dog Cricket amid bipartisan ridicule
SUMMARY: Kristi Noem is competing against North Dakota Gov. Doug Burgum, Senator Tim Scott and Rep. Elise Stefanik, among others, for Trump's vice president spot.

TITLE: Ashley Biden detailed 'pain' from diary theft, urged prison for thief in letter to judge
SUMMARY: Ashley Biden, the daughter of President Joe Biden, asked a judge to sentence the woman who stole her diary to prison, an unsealed letter shows.

TITLE: Trump trial second week concludes with testimony from former secretary and banker
SUMMARY: Prosecutors called Rhona Graff, Trump's personal secretary and a banker who recounted the details of a payment at the heart of the case.
